Text: Job Cc Jerry I would like to refer a friend of mine that is really interested in joining Enron to the Sr Specialist Position in your group He has an MBA degree from Mexicos leading business school and extensive trading and risk management experience Im enclosing his resume for your reference and feel free to contact me or him directly Thanks for your attention Catherine Simoes
